summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the 1975 Budget of the Seattle Arts Commission, increasing an expenditure allowance therein by appropriation from the General Donations and Gift Trust Fund and reappropriation and transfer from certain expenditure allowances in 1975 Budgets of the Seattle Center Department and Department of Parks and Recreation to provide for certain unanticipated costs incurred in connection with the Summer Arts Festival ("Bumbershoot").
